attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the widespread public concern regarding the reasons given for the British involvement in, and the catastrophic consequences of, the Iraq war there should be an immediate and this time totally independent investigation into this matter and the associated events concerning the death of Dr David Kelly. Tony Blair and others should be made to testify under oath and be prosecuted if found to have lied or intentionally misled Parliament or actively interfered with previous investigations.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
